name: ICE 2021 Virtual Congress | 24-28 February 2021
content: In the 2021 edition of the International Congress of Endocrinology, you will enjoy the user-friendly virtual environment that will provide you the opportunity to collaborate across a variety of disciplines and specialties, interact with the speakers, meet industry colleagues, and network with fellow colleagues internationally from the comfort of your home or workplace. In addition, you will also have access to all the content for 90 days after the Congress. ICE Virtual 2021 features: - More than 120 live sessions, including live Q and As - More than 125 invited speakers - 11 Plenary Sessions with top opinion leaders and 45 Meet the Experts - More than 500 original abstracts ICE Congress is also the perfect place to showcase your latest research on Endocrinology. Abstracts submission is open until 30 November (no extensions will be granted). URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/701568-0?pid=4868 Prices: FELAEN Member Society: USD 100.0, ISE Member Society: USD 150.0, Non Member: USD 200.0, Developing Countries: USD 100.0, In Training / Nurse: USD 50.0 Speakers: Nathalie Delzenne, Jacques Drouin, Krishna Chatterjee, Gerard Karsenty, Alberto Kornblihtt, Anna Krook, Peter Rossing, Constantine Stratakis, Alfredo Ulloa-Aguirre, Brian Walker, Corrine Welt Time: 14:00 - 17:00
